title: Pierre Bonnet (boxer)
text:
Pierre Bonnet (July 20, 1910 – September 28, 1983) was a French <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>.
In 1936, he was eliminated in the first round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201936%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20bantamweight">bantamweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="Antoni%20Czortek">Antoni Czortek</a>.
